skins.name: Qiuyuan
skins.description: From Chongzhou to Mingting, across the six states of Huanglong, his worn attire bears the weight of travel, tracing the swordsman's solitary path.

tags.name: Echo Skill DMG Amplification
tags.description: Provides Echo Skill DMG Amplification for a specific Resonator in the team

235.name: Sword Sheathed, Mind Unclouded
235.description:
<color=Highlight>Thus Spoke the Blade: To Teach</color>, <color=Highlight>Thus Spoke the Blade: To Save</color>, and <color=Highlight>Thus Spoke the Blade: To Sacrifice</color> can no longer be interrupted.
Qiuyuan gains {0} Crit. Rate increase.

236.name: O Blade, I, Who Teach No More
236.description: <te href=141103>Bamboo's Shade</te> now grants an additional {0} Echo Skill DMG Amplification to all nearby Resonators in the team.

237.name: O Blade, I, Who Save No More
237.description:
The DMG Multiplier of Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Sundering Strike</color> is increased by {0}.
If Concerto Energy is full when not in the Inksplash of Mind state, Qiuyuan's <color=Highlight>Resonance Skill</color> is replaced with Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Straw Cape in Drizzly Rain</color>, available once every 20s.
Upon casting <color=Highlight>Straw Cape in Drizzly Rain</color>, the <color=Highlight>Quietude Within</color> effect immediately ends and {1} Concerto Energy is consumed to deal <color=Wind>Aero DMG</color> equal to {3} of Qiuyuan's ATK, considered Echo Skill DMG, and restore {2} points of <te href=141101>Swordster's Soliloquy</te>. The next <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> is replaced with <color=Highlight>Thus Spoke the Blade: Inkwash</color> Stage 3. 
Upon casting <color=Highlight>Straw Cape in Drizzly Rain</color>, Qiuyuan cannot gain the <color=Highlight>Quietude Within</color> effect the next time he enters <te href=141102>Inksplash of Mind</te>. <color=Highlight>Thus Spoke the Blade: To Teach</color>, <color=Highlight>Thus Spoke the Blade: To Save</color>, and <color=Highlight>Thus Spoke the Blade: To Sacrifice</color> gain {4} DMG Multiplier increase and additionally restore <SapTag=5>{5}</SapTag> {Cus:Sap,S=point P=points SapTag=5} of Concerto Energy on hit.
When not in Co-op mode, upon casting <color=Highlight>Straw Cape in Drizzly Rain</color>, the next <color=Highlight>Outro Skill</color> is replaced with Outro Skill <color=Highlight>Sheath Fallen, New Shoots Revealed</color>, which deals <color=Wind>Aero DMG</color> equal to {6} of Qiuyuan's ATK, considered Echo Skill DMG.

238.name: O Blade, I, Who Sacrifice No More

239.name: O Blade, I, Who Await to be Wielded
239.description: Qiuyuan now ignores {0} of the target's DEF when dealing damage.

240.name: Thus I Heard, Thus I Saw, Thus I Spoke
240.description:
Casting Heavy Attack <color=Highlight>Thus Spoke the Blade: To Sacrifice</color> stagnates nearby targets for {0}s or until the targets are damaged or until Qiuyuan is switched off the field. This effect is not available in the Co-op Mode.
When Qiuyuan is the active Resonator in the team, upon exiting <te href=141102>Inksplash of Mind</te>, he deals <color=Wind>Aero DMG</color> equal to {1} of his ATK to all targets within range, considered Echo Skill DMG.
Casting Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Straw Cape in Drizzly Rain</color> increases Qiuyuan's Crit. DMG by {2} for {3}s. Switching to another Resonator ends this effect early.

params.name: Inkwash
params.description:
<size=40><color=Title>Basic Attack</color></size>
Perform up to 3 consecutive attacks, dealing <color=Wind>Aero DMG</color>.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Heavy Attack</color></size>
Consume STA to attack the target, dealing <color=Wind>Aero DMG</color>. {Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} <color=Highlight>Normal Attack</color> within a certain period of time after casting this skill to perform Basic Attack <color=Highlight>Thus Spoke the Blade: Inkwash</color> Stage 4.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Mid-air Attack</color></size>
Consume STA to perform Plunging Attack, dealing <color=Wind>Aero DMG</color>.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Dodge Counter</color></size>
{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} <color=Highlight>Normal Attack</color> right after a successful <color=Highlight>Dodge</color> to attack the target, dealing <color=Wind>Aero DMG</color>, considered as <color=Highlight>Heavy Attack</color>.
Moments after a <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> or <color=Highlight>Heavy Attack</color>, Qiuyuan becomes immune to the next instance of DMG he takes and casts <color=Highlight>Dodge Counter</color> upon being attacked, dealing <color=Wind>Aero DMG</color>.

params.name: Through the Groves
params.description:
{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} <color=Highlight>Resonance Skill</color> to dash forward for a distance, dealing <color=Wind>Aero DMG</color>, considered as Echo Skill DMG. If <color=Highlight>Resonance Skill</color> is cast upon being attacked by an enemy target, Qiuyuan becomes immune to this instance of DMG and stagnates nearby enemies, while gaining immunity to interruption during this <color=Highlight>Resonance Skill</color>.
Switching to other Resonators removes the Stagnation effect from enemies.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Undaunted Wayfarer</color></size>
Hold <color=Highlight>Resonance Skill</color> to dash forward for a distance at the cost of STA, dealing <color=Wind>Aero DMG</color> to the target, considered as Echo Skill DMG.
If there are no targets nearby, Qiuyuan will leap up and dash through the air by continuously consuming STA until it runs out. Release <color=Highlight>Resonance Skill</color> to immediately end the dash and land. If there are targets nearby when Qiuyuan lands, deal <color=Wind>Aero DMG</color> to nearby targets, considered as Echo Skill DMG. This skill can be cast in mid-air.

params.name: Sundering Strike
params.description:
Deal <color=Wind>Aero DMG</color> to targets within range, considered as Echo Skill DMG.
For every {1} of Qiuyuan's Crit. Rate over {0}, this skill increases the Crit. DMG of all nearby active Resonators in the team by {2} for {3}s, up to {4}.

params.name: Quietude Within
params.description:
Qiuyuan obtains <color=Highlight>Quietude Within</color> for {0}s upon entering the <te href=141102>Inksplash of Mind</te> state. This effect can be triggered once every {3}s.
Heavy Attack <color=Highlight>Thus Spoke the Blade: To Teach</color>, <color=Highlight>Thus Spoke the Blade: To Save</color>, and <color=Highlight>Thus Spoke the Blade: To Sacrifice</color> deal {1} more DMG. <color=Highlight>Thus Spoke the Blade: To Sacrifice</color> additionally restores <SapTag=2>{2}</SapTag> {Cus:Sap,S=point P=points SapTag=2} of Concerto Energy on hit.
- This effect ends early when Qiuyuan is switched off the field.

params.name: Drink Away Woes Age-Old
params.description:
When casting Echo Skill, Qiuyuan's bamboo flask absorbs the overflowing energy and brews it into <color=Highlight>Flowing Panacea</color>.
The next time <te href=141101>Swordster's Soliloquy</te> is obtained, the <color=Highlight>Flowing Panacea</color> is consumed to gain {0} ATK increase for {1}s.

params.name: Attack the Must-Defend
params.description:
Attack the target, dealing <color=Wind>Aero DMG</color>, considered as Heavy Attack DMG.
Within a certain period of time after casting this skill, {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} <color=Highlight>Normal Attack</color> to perform Basic Attack <color=Highlight>Thus Spoke the Blade: Inkwash</color> Stage 3.

params.name: Verdant Edge
params.description:
<size=40><color=Title>Basic Attack - Thus Spoke the Blade: Inkwash</color></size>
When Qiuyuan reaches {0} points of <te href=141101>Swordster's Soliloquy</te>, his <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> is replaced with Basic Attack <color=Highlight>Thus Spoke the Blade: Inkwash</color>, which chains together up to 4 consecutive strikes, dealing <color=Wind>Aero DMG</color>, considered as Heavy Attack DMG.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Bamboo's Shade</color></size>
When Qiuyuan reaches {1} points of <te href=141101>Swordster's Soliloquy</te>, he gains the <color=Highlight>Bamboo's Shade</color> effect, granting all nearby active Resonators in the team {2} Echo Skill DMG Bonus for {3}s.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Inksplash of Mind</color></size>
When <te href=141101>Swordster's Soliloquy</te> is full, Qiuyuan enters the <color=Highlight>Inksplash of Mind</color> state for {4}s, during which <color=Highlight>Heavy Attack</color> is replaced with Heavy Attack <color=Highlight>Thus Spoke the Blade: To Save</color>.
In this state, hold <color=Highlight>Normal Attack</color> to consume Swordster's Soliloquy to perform Heavy Attack <color=Highlight>Thus Spoke the Blade: To Teach</color>, <color=Highlight>Thus Spoke the Blade: To Save</color>, and <color=Highlight>Thus Spoke the Blade: To Sacrifice</color> in order, dealing <color=Wind>Aero DMG</color>, considered as Heavy Attack DMG.
- Performing <color=Highlight>Thus Spoke the Blade: To Teach</color>, <color=Highlight>Thus Spoke the Blade: To Save</color>, or <color=Highlight>Thus Spoke the Blade: To Sacrifice</color> is considered as performing <color=Highlight>Echo Skill</color>.
- Inksplash of Mind ends when Swordster's Soliloquy is used up.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Swordster's Soliloquy</color></size>
Qiuyuan can hold up to {5} points of Swordster's Soliloquy.
- {6} points of Swordster's Soliloquy is obtained when performing <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> Stage 3.
- {7} points of Swordster's Soliloquy is obtained when performing each stage of Basic Attack <color=Highlight>Thus Spoke the Blade: Inkwash</color>.
- {8} points of Swordster's Soliloquy is obtained when performing <color=Highlight>Dodge Counter</color>.
- {9} points of Swordster's Soliloquy is obtained when performing <color=Highlight>Intro Skill</color>.
- Swordster's Soliloquy cannot be obtained in the Inksplash of Mind state.
- Swordster's Soliloquy is cleared when the Inksplash of Mind state ends.

1308021.name: Thus Spoke the Blade: Inkwash Stage 1 DMG

1308022.name: Thus Spoke the Blade: Inkwash Stage 2 DMG

1308023.name: Thus Spoke the Blade: Inkwash Stage 3 DMG

1308024.name: Thus Spoke the Blade: Inkwash Stage 4 DMG

1308025.name: Thus Spoke the Blade: To Teach DMG

1308026.name: Thus Spoke the Blade: To Save DMG

1308027.name: Thus Spoke the Blade: To Sacrifice DMG

params.name: Strike Before Ready
params.description:
Attack the target, dealing <color=Wind>Aero DMG</color> equal to {0} of Qiuyuan's ATK, considered as Echo Skill DMG.
Grant {1} Echo Skill DMG Amplification to the incoming Resonator, lasting for {2}s or until the Resonator is switched out.

params.name: Tune Break: Sword
params.description: When the target's <color=Highlight>Off-Tune Level</color> is full, the Resonator may cast <color=Highlight><te href=100001>Tune Break</te></color> on the target.
